data.text: @burrowingbolt Keeping fingers crossed Murray that Granny Meg doesn’t catch Covid and Grandpa Ernest continuesto be ok!!!
@burrowingbolt I pray that Grandma will be ok ❤️
@burrowingbolt ❤️🤗🙏 for you all. Fingers crossed for Grandma

@burrowingbolt He is a very very special soul and he has good and strong people around him.

This twilight journey will end when his body says this is enough, let me take you home. 🙅🏻‍♀️🕊
@burrowingbolt Sending very best wishes to you all.
@burrowingbolt Sending enormous love and hugs to both GM and GE 🤗💗 x
@burrowingbolt Hoping they’re both ok, and that Granny Meg doesn’t test positive 🤞🤞

@punkscience8 Thank you so much, in the last 18 months he has had infected gallbladder, abcess on his liver, 2 strokes, covid & admitted to covid ward, now covid again, he is amazing but declines more each time 😔
@burrowingbolt And you are right there with them, take care of yourself and test❤️
